# The `FreezeInst` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This class represents a freeze function that returns random concrete value if an operand is either a poison value or an undef value. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::FreezeInst</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

This class represents a freeze function that returns random concrete value if an operand is either a poison value or an undef value.

Definition at line 5088 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/instructions-h">Instructions.h</a>.
